My friends in Europe and America pride themselves on quitting Facebook, but FB is where indigenous Taiwanese and India’s DNTs are mobilizing and sharing their stories. They need FB (or something like it). Let’s regulate FB, not abandon it!

This looks like an important new book 📚!

Placing Empire examines the spatial politics of Japanese imperialism through a study of Japanese travel and tourism to Korea, Manchuria, and Taiwan between the late nineteenth century and the early 1950s.
